channel.title: User Chat - Real time chat/message API & toolkit
channel.description:
Hey all, my name is Travis. I'm one of the founders @ [User Chat](https://userchat.io/).
We've built a real time chat api that allows other developers to quickly and easily add real time messaging to their video games, applications, or websites at an affordable price. We're a small two man team from Burlington, VT and would love any feedback we can get.
Thanks, Travis
